      • findDivisor

        public int findDivisor(int number)
        Finds and returns all the factors of a number
        Given : the number
        Returns : An ArrayList of numbers that are the factors of the number
        Parameters:
        number - - Number entered by user
        Returns:
        the next factor of the number (called recursively to find ALL factors)

      • isPrime

        public boolean isPrime(int number)
        Determines if the submitted number is Prime.
        A number if Prime IF : It is Divisible only by itself and 1
        Returns : true (IF Prime) or false (if NOT Prime)
        If the number is divisible by 2 (And NOT = 2) the number CANNOT be prime
        Parameters:
        number - integer - Specified number
        Returns:
        true or false

      • Min

        public int Min(int a,
               int b)
        Finds the largest of 2 numbers.
        Parameters:
        a - int - First Number
        b - int - Second Number
        Returns:
        the larger of the 2 numbers
        ALGORITHM
        IF a .GE. b RETURN a ELSE RETURN b

      • greatestCommonDivisor

        public int greatestCommonDivisor(int a,
                                 int b)
        Finds the Greatest Common Denominator of 2 numbers.
        Parameters:
        a - int - First Number
        b - int - Second Number
        Returns:
        the greatest common divisor of positive numbers
        ALGORITHM
        See Euclidean Algorithm for Computing the GCD of a number

      • pyramidVolume

        public double pyramidVolume(double altitude,
                            double base)
        Computes the Volume of a right square-base pyramid.
        Given : the base and height of the pyramid
        Returns : The volume of the pyramid
        Parameters:
        altitude - double = height (or altitude) of pyramid.
        base - double = length of one side of base
        Returns:
        Volume = b*b*h / 3;
